title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description:
reproduction
Medium-scale design of continuous twining vines and leaves in rust, biege and black, on neige ground. Peppering of black dots on the biege ground outlines the pattern. Two plain cloth selvages printed to edge. 7.5cm ruffle down one long side. Hand and machine stitching.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. 1953-54-5.
